pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface Between R and the OpenStreetMap-Based Routing Service Valhalla // An interface between R and the 'Valhalla' API. 'Valhalla' is a routing service based on 'OpenStreetMap' data. See https://valhalla.github.io/valhalla/ for more information. This package enables the computation of routes, trips, isochrones and travel distances matrices (travel time and kilometer distance).
